name: nativescript-ffmpeg
description: A Nativescript wrapper for the FFmpeg library. (ONLY SUPPORTS ANDROID)

scripts.release:major: changelog -M && cd src && npm version major && cd ../ && git add . && git commit -m 'chore(release): major version release' && npm version major && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m && cd src && npm version minor && cd ../ && git add . && git commit -m 'chore(release): minor version release' && npm version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p && cd src && npm version patch && cd ../ && git add . && git commit -m 'chore(release): patch version release' && npm version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.postinstall: cd src && npm run build && cd ../demo && npm i
